prev.title: Drive: Checking the Access of a File

title: Drive: Disabling and Enabling Sharing of a File
body:
Drive: Disabling and Enabling Sharing of a File¶

To share a file, you must enable sharing.
If you own a file and have granted view or edit privileges to other users but do not want them to share the file, you can disable sharing.
To disable or enable sharing you must have navigated to the desired file. Refer here if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Click Disable Sharing in the info tab

    • Alternatively, click to access this option

  2. Click Disable Sharing

  3. To revert, click Enable Sharing
rellinks: Drive: Checking the Access of a File
toc: • Drive: Disabling and Enabling Sharing of a File
